title: Port Macquarie Waterfront Serenity with Cabana-Lined Pool & Daily Buffet Breakfast
description:
Breathe in the fresh, salty air with a tranquil escape at Sails Port Macquarie by Rydges, a waterfront resort overlooking the Hastings River and Port Macquarie Marina. With glorious beaches and lush hinterland, Port Macquarie is beloved by Brisbane and Sydney-siders looking for seaside serenity. Discover a natural paradise frequented by dolphins, whales, koalas and more, using the luxe Sails Port Macquarie by Rydges as a launchpad for adventures near and far.

Plunge into the crystal-clear, resort-style pool with views overlooking the Hastings River, laze in the shade of a private cabana, or stroll down to the renowned The Boathouse Bar & Restaurant, where delicious cocktails and expertly prepared meals await.
offer_address: 20 Park Street, Port Macquarie, New South Wales 2444, Australia

title: Port Macquarie Top-Rated Waterfront Oasis with Daily Breakfast
description:
Embrace the fresh salty air and seaside beauty of New South Wales' Mid North Coast with a tranquil escape at Sails Port Macquarie by Rydges - an idyllic and recently refurbished destination overlooking the Hastings River, adjacent to Port Macquarie Marina. With glorious beaches, lush hinterland, and a near-perfect climate year-round, Port Macquarie is a firm favourite for couple's breaks and family escapes. Discover a natural paradise frequented by dolphins, whales, koalas and more, and use Sails Port Macquarie by Rydges as a launchpad for adventures near and far.

Unparalleled sophistication, state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service to match; it's little surprise Sails Port Macquarie by Rydges was awarded a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2021 badge, ranking it among the top 10% of properties worldwide on the review site. Plunge into the crystal-clear, resort-style pool with views overlooking the Hastings River, laze in the shade of a private cabana or stroll down to the renowned Boathouse Bar & Restaurant, where delicious cocktails and expertly prepared meals await.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start each day with your choice of hot breakfast item at The Boathouse Restaurant & Bar
- Enjoy a daily barista-made coffee per person to fuel your adventures
- Toast your escape with a bottle of sparkling wine on arrival

**Travelling as a family?** Check out the Garden View or Water View Suite upgrades for two adults and up to two children (11 and under).
offer_address: 20 Park Street, Port Macquarie, New South Wales 2444, Australia

title: Port Macquarie Coastal Escape in the Heart of the City
description:
A paradise of gorgeous beaches, lush hinterland and breathtaking views over Hastings River, Port Macquarie is more than just the perfect coastal escape - it’s a chance to reconnect with nature. Immerse yourself in the green of Wauchope's hinterland, escape to the tranquil waterways of Camden Haven and discover the city’s speakeasies or nearby vineyards.

Experience everything this serene coastal haven has to offer from Rydges Port Macquarie’s central CBD location with daily breakfast and a welcome bottle of sparkling wine in your room on arrival.

title: Port Macquarie Newly Renovated Coastal Bliss with Daily Breakfast & Complimentary Parking
description:
A stunning transformation has breathed new life into this riverside retreat, with every facet reimagined to capture Port Macquarie's seaside beauty with modern finesse. Nestled on the banks of the Hastings River, this tranquil haven boasts sweeping water views from every corner, inviting guests to soak in the serene surroundings.

With a prime riverside location, Zebu has fresh local flavours with spectacular vistas, making it the perfect place to unwind with a glass of vino as the sun sets. Unwind with a book by the sparkling pool, enjoy moments of peacefulness in your light-filled room or set out to experience the best of the Mid North Coast.

Mere moments from the centre of Port Macquarie, explore the town's lively coastal culture from charming boutiques to nearby galleries and theatres, or stroll to the golden sands of Town Beach. With a prime location by the water and stylish revitalised spaces, this retreat is the ideal home-away-from-home whether you're seeking adventure or total relaxation.
offer_address: 1 Hay Street, Port Macquarie, New South Wales 2444, Australia

title: New South Wales Mercure Coastal Escape in the Heart of Port Macquarie with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
The essence of Port Macquarie is an off-the-clock, around-the-clock mentality, with the crash of the waves determining your activities for the day at the perfectly located Mercure Centro Port Macquarie. Instantly feel relaxed and energised as you tick off all 17 unique beaches or lounge in the outdoor pool, where you're almost guaranteed perfect weather (an average temperature in the early to mid-twenties all year round) and an abundance of glorious sunshine peeking through the rows of towering pine trees. 

Start each morning with a hearty breakfast at Synergy Restaurant, then stay close in a conveniently located brewery (Black Duck Brewery is only 10 minutes away) or tackle the stunning Coastal Walk, winding its way from the CBD along 9km of coastal trail and beaches to Tacking Point Lighthouse in the south (with plenty of cafés along the way). As the sun begins to set, wander down to the bar to sip on a lavish cocktail and treat your tastebuds to a contemporary meal at the restaurant.
offer_address: 103 William St, Port Macquarie, New South Wales 2444 Australia

title: Waterfront Port Macquarie Escape with Infinity Pool
description: Amid a paradise of gorgeous beaches, lush hinterland and breathtaking Hastings River views, Rydges Port Macquarie offers the perfect setting for a serene coastal escape. Its location, right in the heart of the CBD on the banks of Hastings River, and just a 15-minute walk from beautiful Town Beach, means relaxing swimming spots and surf beaches aren't hard to reach. After days of exploring, retire to your cosy accommodation to take a dip in the swimming pool or stop for a bite at the waterfront Zebu Bar & Restaurant.
offer_address: 1 Hay Street, Port Macquarie, New South Wales 2444, Australia

title: Port Macquarie Coastal Escape
description:
Experience the charms of this coastal town at the centrally located Rydges Port Macquarie. A paradise of gorgeous beaches and lush hinterland, Port Macquarie is more than just a beautiful escape - it offers a chance to reconnect with nature. Immerse yourself in the green of Wauchope's hinterland, escape to the tranquil waterways of Camden Haven and discover the city’s speakeasies or nearby vineyards.

Located just a four-hour drive north of Sydney, Rydges Port Macquarie overlooks the breathtaking Hastings River and is a mere three-minute drive from beautiful Town Beach. Make sure you enjoy the hotel’s convenient location and incredible onsite facilities - including the award-winning Zebu Bar & Restaurant and a swimming pool - alongside tranquil water views.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- A$50 dining credit per room towards food
- Bottle of sparkling wine on arrival
offer_address: 1 Hay Street, Port Macquarie, New South Wales 2444, Australia

From the resort-style pool and spa with private cabanas and expert chefs preparing signature dishes in the renowned Boathouse Bar & Restaurant, a stay at Sails Port Macquarie by Rydges will ensure ample opportunity to relax and rejuvenate.

title: Stylish Port Macquarie Resort with Breathtaking Waterfront Location
description: Breathe in the fresh, salty air with a stylish stay at Sails Port Macquarie by Rydges. Overlooking the Hastings River and adjacent to Port Macquarie Marina, this is the ultimate in coastal escapes. Enjoy a swim in the resort-style pool with views over the Hastings River, laze in the shade of a private cabana, or stroll down to the renowned The Boathouse Bar & Restaurant, where delicious cocktails and expertly prepared meals await. Just steps from sweeping beaches lined with rainforest, discover a natural paradise frequented by dolphins, whales, and koalas, and use this as your base for adventures near and far, with coastal walks, whale-watching cruises and the Port Macquarie Koala Hospital on your doorstep.

title: Port Macquarie Coastal Escape near Hastings River with Waterfront Restaurant
description: A paradise of gorgeous beaches, lush hinterland and breathtaking views over the Hastings River, Rydges Port Macquarie is more than just the perfect coastal escape. Located just a four-hour drive north of Sydney, the hotel is nestled between shimmering waters and the town's best restaurants, bars, galleries and boutiques. Just a two-minute drive from beautiful Town Beach, relaxing swimming spots and surf beaches for adventurous travellers aren't hard to reach. After exploring all day, retire to your cosy accommodation at night, stopping for a bite at the waterfront Zebu Bar & Restaurant or taking a dip in the hotel's swimming pool.

title: Stunning Port Macquarie Escape Moments from Town Beach with Shimmering Indoor Pool
description: Sitting opposite beautiful Town Beach, and surrounded by local bars and eateries, this charming Port Macquarie stay showcases the very best this coastal town has to offer. Spend your days exploring pristine beaches, cruising down coast-hugging roads and picking farm-fresh strawberries. Venture out to explore the Hastings River wine region. Back at the hotel, take advantage of the indoor heated lap pool, sauna and barbecue entertainment area.
offer_address: 40 William Street, Port Macquarie, NSW, Australia, 2444

title: Port Macquarie Self-Contained Escape near Flynns Beach
description: Succumb to your deepest form of relaxation in the subtropical haven of Port Macquarie with a stay in the leafy Club Wyndham Flynns Beach resort. This quaint slice of paradise is set amongst tropical gardens and houses a vast outdoor heated pool and delicious Henry’s Restaurant & Bar. Club Wyndham Flynns Beach is the idyllic group or family vacation destination, boasting self-contained apartments and villas. This almost-beachside escape promises glorious sunshine, pristine coastlines and vibrant rain forests.
offer_address: 14-20 Flynn Street, Port Macquarie, New South Wales, 2444, Australia
